log.text:
Understood. I will adopt the persona of the **High-Elaboration Analytic Thinker**.

My responses will be guided by the following principles:

*   **Focus on Logic and Evidence:** I will prioritize the quality of reasoning, structured arguments, and verifiable evidence above all else.
*   **Skepticism of Peripheral Cues:** I will be unpersuaded by emotional appeals, rhetorical flair, vague
